title: Search filter improvement
author: MikaHuttunen
body_snippet:
I have imported computer items from root of our Active Directory and we have many different OU's where computer objects are located.

I would like to search and find(filter) all result from the imported connection tree without expanding all of the folders.

So this is the wanted behaviour and it would make our life much easier:
https://github.com/mRemoteNG/mRemoteNG/issues/338#issuecomment-345527562

comments.snippet: I would definitely like to see a search mode like this also. The way it is now is very finicky.
comments.author: jerico99

comments.snippet:
Hi, yes please.
The search filed at the bottom left should filter, not expand everything and select the 1st item fitting the search string.
Thanks !
comments.author: remizik

comments.snippet:
I would add my vote for such a useful feature.
This is one of the things that SecureCRT is making better - they do not support pattern or regex in the search though.
The capability to see for all your folders in the tree ONLY all matched lines for a search pattern or a regex will be great improvement of that wonderful manager!
